msbt.message: The horseshoe crab looks likea horseshoe? Says who?Whoever comes up with names for these creatures has quite the imagination, .
What a striking creature the sea pineapple is! Like a living work of art. And it adds just the right splash of color to the aquarium, !
I wonder just how sharp a lobster's pincers arePerhaps it would slice some for me if I asked nicely, .
My stars, just look at the way this gigas giant clam moves!I'm sure it's perfectly lovely, but it is going to haunt my dreams, !
Look at the umbrella octopus swim! It's like the belle of the undersea ball, !
The red king crab really is quite regal with those long, powerful legs.All of its little crab subjects must look at it in awe, .
Watching such an elegant creature I can't help but feel I might float away myself
Why, the chambered nautilus is peeking out of its shell a bit!You silly, handsome creature What on earth do you have to be shy about, ?
The spider crab's legs are so elegant. Perhaps it should consider a career in modeling, !
I understand the giant isopod can roll up into a ball like its smaller pill-bug cousin. If that's the case, perhaps it should be called a giant pillfish instead, !
Why, you donated this, didn't you? What a wonderful gift to us all. Thank you, .
